prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Drums, Guitar, Piano, but without Synth Pad.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Bass, Drums, Guitar, and Piano, but no Synth Pad.

Style 2:
This song is comprised of Bass, Drums, Guitar, and Piano, omitting the Synth Pad.

Style 3:
This composition is Bass, Drums, Guitar, Piano - no Synth Pad.
